name: A Slime Out Of Time
description:
Travel through the perilous [Tower] and slip through numerous dangers to help this little slime get its life back. Make friends, make enemies and talk with interesting characters. Prove your worth, and at the top you shall receive your wish. /- Download the zip file at the bottom for a better experience. -/

This was a school project made with love over the course of two months. Thank you for playing the game! Please leave feedback in the comments section of this page to help me improve. 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Credits to the beautiful people who made these assets: 
  • 2D platformer controller - https://www.youtube.com/c/Bardent
  • Dialogue & save system - https://www.youtube.com/c/trevermock
  • Slime - https://rvros.itch.io/, https://reffpixels.itch.io/
  • Props - https://cainos.itch.io/
  • Tileset - https://adamatomic.itch.io/
  • Menu - https://www.slimui.com/
  • Witch pixel art; Portrait (modified) ; House - https://chierit.itch.io/ ; https://cobralad.itch.io/ ; https://brullov.itch.io/ 
  • Witch house - https://brullov.itch.io/
  • Music - https://svl.itch.io/
  • Menu background art - https://edermunizz.itch.io/
  • Parallax background - https://trixelized.itch.io/
  • Foliage shader - https://github.com/aarthificial
  • FX: Time spell; Dust Trail; Dash smoke - https://pipoya.itch.io/; https://pimen.itch.io/; https://nyknck.itch.io/
  • Pickups - https://deepdivegamestudio.itch.io/; https://pixelfrog-assets.itch.io/
For celeste fans, you could probably tell that the tutorial was basically just celeste's tutorial. As a beginner, the best path for me to learn was to imitate, so that's what I did. I hope I didn't butcher it too badly. - BeetJuicer
